steps.name: Given that the entando-k8s-controller-coordinator has been deployed along with the entando-k8s-service
And I have created an externally provisioned Keycloak SSO capability and waited for it to become available
When I create an EntandoApp that requires SSO and a PostgreSQL DBMS capability
Then I expect to see a PostgreSQL database capability that has been made available
And a deployment for the Entando App

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As an Entando Operator users, I want to use a deploy the Entando Controller Coordinator as a Docker container so that I don't need to know any of its implementation details to use it.
